summary: RustyTraders Auto Harvest Rewrite of Auto Harvest by LaoArchAngel
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=4]Description[/size][/b][/u]
This is a rewrite of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10067]Auto Harvest[/url] to make it compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4955]83Willows 101BugsHD[/url] so that [b]Auto Harvest[/b] can harvest the bugs from [b]83Willows 101BugsHD[/b]

[b][u][size=4]New MCM Config Menu[/size][/u][/b] as of Version 1.7
[b][size=4]Dawnguard[/size][/b] as of Version 1.8
[b][size=4]Dragonborn[/size][/b] as of Version 1.9

[b][u][size=4]Invisibility Bug[/size][/u][/b]
If you Find that you get them message [b]\"auto harvest skip - invisibility\"[/b] Even when you are not Invisable, it is that a Keyword is attached to your Character that Indicates you are Invisible.
To fixed it run SKSE\'s clearinvalidregistrations (as described in the comments by Rotaur here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31675]How to REMOVE ALL embedded scripts from your savegame - Tutorial[/url]). 

Harvesting cycles is scaled according to Alchemy Level
The Left Value is with 0 Alchemy the right is with 100 Alchemy
10 -> 2 Second Interval
The Harvester will try to harvest a total of 4 times, 2 Times at each distance
 [u]Max 2000[/u]    [u]Max 1500[/u]    [u]Max 1000[/u]   [u]Max 500[/u]
2000->3000  1500->2250  1000->1500  500->750           
1000->1500   750->1125   500->750   250->375

This will force the harvesting of items closer to you first.
Fixed a bug where we were harvesting Inactive items from Hearthfire House Interiors
Fixed a bug where we harvested the same item over and over and over

[b][u]MCM Menu[/u][/b]
Enable or Disable Harvest Items
Advance menu you can set [u]Min Interval[/u] from 2 to 8.5 Seconds and [u]Base Distance[/u] from 500 to 4000 Units
You can Split Harvesting for Veggies in the Advance menu, will try to add more later

Distance Units Shown as Images up Top
2000 Units = The Distance from Dawnguard Door to the Arch of Sleeping Area
1000 Units = The Distance from Dawnguard Door to the Centre of the Reception Area

[b][u]To Test Your Own Distance[/u][/b]
[list=1][*]Make Power [b]AutoHarvest Settings[/b] Active Power
[*]Activate Power
[*]Select [b]Range[/b] Option
[*]Select [b]Cheese it[/b] Option (Should Teleport you to Testing Area)
[*]If nothing Happens do next step or Skip to Point 8
[*]Enter Console Command Normally ~
[*]Enter [b]coc rt_AutoHarvestTestArea[/b] and press <Enter>
[*]You should be standing in a Large Room (Testing Area) (If not do previous line coc command.)
[*]Click on the Test Stone to Run a Range Simulation Test
[*]Should Spawn 4 Circles of Cheese Wheels For Each of the Harvest Distances.
[*]When done click on the Return Teleport Stone to Return to where you were[/list]


[b][u]Spells[/u][/b]
[list=1][*]Auto Harvest On/Off (Start/Stop Harvesting, Need to Restart +- Every 5 Levels of Alchemy)
[*]Auto Harvest Setup (Set What you want to Harvest, Need to Stop & Start Harvesting Afterward)
[list][*]Bugs
[*]Coins (Coin Bags)
[*]Fish  (Normal & Small)
[*]Flora
[*]Nests  (Eggs)
[*]Trees
[*]Veggies
[*]Dawnguard
[*]Loose Items[/list][/list]

[b]Now includes [u]Spider Egg[/u] Harvesting and [u]Bee Hive[/u] Harvesting[/b]
[b]Now includes 

The Start of the Harvesting does take longer, that is due to the processing of what is to be Harvested. 

[b][u][size=4]Compatibility[/size][/b][/u]
NOT Compatible with Original [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10067]Auto Harvest[/url] (Only one of the 2 Should be installed)
Use its own Objects and should be compatible with any mod that adds items to the Base Critters list. 

[b][u][size=4]Required[/size][/b][/u]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] Ver 1.6.5 or above (might work with earlier versions)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863/][b][size=3]SkyUI[/size][/b][/url]
[b][size=3]Dawnguard[/size][/b]
[b][size=3]Dragonborn[/size][/b]

[b][u][size=4]Installation[/size][/b][/u]
Simply use the Nexus Mod Manager or put the contents of this mod in your Skyrim data folder.
Ensure it is Loaded after the other mods that add new objects.

[b][u][size=4]Uninstall[/size][/b][/u]
If installed by the NMM (Nexus mod manger) then just uninstall using NMM
OR
Ensure you Remove the following Scripts as they are now in the bsa file
[code]
data\\scripts\\rt_magicAutoHarvestMenu.pex
data\\scripts\\source\\rt_magicAutoHarvestMenu.psc
data\\scripts\\rt_magicAutoHarvest.pex
data\\scripts\\source\\rt_magicAutoHarvest.psc
data\\scripts\\rt_AutoHarvestQuest_01000d63.pex
data\\scripts\\source\\rt_AutoHarvestQuest_01000d63.psc
data\\scripts\\rt_autoharvestQuestscript.pex
data\\scripts\\source\\rt_autoharvestQuestscript.psc
[\\code]
data\\rt_AutoHarvest.bsa
data\\rt_AutoHarvest.bsl
data\\rt_AutoHarvest.esp

[b][u][size=4]Credits[/size][/b][/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/533284]LaoArchAngel[/url] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10067]Auto Harvest[/url]

[b][u][size=4]My Other Mods[/size][/b][/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19572]RustyTraders Harvest The Dead[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14467]RustyTraders Teleportation[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22984]RustyTraders Magic Arrows[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19798]RustyTraders Ghost Form[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28315]RustyTraders Auto Harvest[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30870]RustyTraders Solitude Library[/url]
author: RustyTrader

files.name: Rustys_Auto_Harvest_v1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Rewrite AutoHarvest for Compatability
Add a Menu System to Decide What to harvest

files.name: Rustys_Auto_Harvest_v1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Harvest Spider Eggs
Harvest Bee Hives

files.name: Rustys_Auto_Harvest_V1_4
files.changelogHtml:
Reduce Max harvest distance from 5000 to 2000
Add Options to Select Min Cycle Duration 2 to 6.5 Seconds
Add Option to Select MAx Harvest distance 500 to 2000 Units
Add Test for being in Faction to harvest Owned Items wihout stealing (Buggy)

files.name: Rustys_Auto_Harvest_v1_5
files.changelogHtml: Add a Test Room for Showing the Harvest Distance

files.name: Rustys_Auto_Harvest_v1_6
files.changelogHtml: Cap Alchemy Skill at 100 for Calculations

files.name: Rustys_Auto_Harvest_v1_7
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the Repeated Harvest of Same Item (Over & Over & Over)
Added MCM Menu for Configuration
